results.title: Lisinopril reduces cardiac hypertrophy and mortality in rats with aortocaval fistula.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ reduces @DISEASE_Cardiomegaly @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ and mortality in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Fistula</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005402 @@@aortocaval fistula@@@.

citations.NLM: Oka T, Nishimura H, Ueyama M, Kubota J, Kawamura K. Lisinopril reduces cardiac hypertrophy and mortality in rats with aortocaval fistula. Eur J Pharmacol. 1993 Mar 30;234(1):55-60. PMID: 8386093
citations.BibTeX: @article{8386093, title={Lisinopril reduces cardiac hypertrophy and mortality in rats with aortocaval fistula.}, author={Oka T and Nishimura H and Ueyama M and Kubota J and Kawamura K}, journal={Eur J Pharmacol}, volume={234}, number={1}, pages={55-60}}

results.title: Differential Effects of Prevention and Reversal Treatment with Lisinopril on Left Ventricular Remodelling in a Rat Model of Heart Failure.
results.text_hl: Sprague-Dawley @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were assigned to sham, untreated @<m>DISEASE_Fistula</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005402 @@@AV fistula@@@ (21 weeks), @<m>DISEASE_Fistula</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005402 @@@AV fistula@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (21 weeks), or @<m>DISEASE_Fistula</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005402 @@@AV fistula@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ from six to 21 weeks post-@<m>DISEASE_Fistula</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005402 @@@fistula@@@ groups.

citations.NLM: Brower GL, Levick SP, Janicki JS. Differential Effects of Prevention and Reversal Treatment with Lisinopril on Left Ventricular Remodelling in a Rat Model of Heart Failure. Heart Lung Circ. 2015 Sep;24(9):919-24. PMID: 25837018
citations.BibTeX: @article{25837018, title={Differential Effects of Prevention and Reversal Treatment with Lisinopril on Left Ventricular Remodelling in a Rat Model of Heart Failure.}, author={Brower GL and Levick SP and Janicki JS}, journal={Heart Lung Circ}, volume={24}, number={9}, pages={919-24}}

results.title: Converting enzyme inhibition improves congestion and survival in hypertensive rats with high-output heart failure.
results.text_hl: Heart weight, BP, and CO were not affected by @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@. Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ ameliorated @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@congestion@@@ and improved survival in SHR with @<m>DISEASE_Fistula</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005402 @@@fistula@@@ without compromising cardiorenal hemodynamics.

citations.NLM: Nishimura H, Oka T, Ueyama M, Kubota J, Kawamura K. Converting enzyme inhibition improves congestion and survival in hypertensive rats with high-output heart failure. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1994 Jan;23(1):149-54. PMID: 7511728
citations.BibTeX: @article{7511728, title={Converting enzyme inhibition improves congestion and survival in hypertensive rats with high-output heart failure.}, author={Nishimura H and Oka T and Ueyama M and Kubota J and Kawamura K}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={23}, number={1}, pages={149-54}}
